about: I am Mohamed Bouzidi, a passionate UX/UI designer from Morocco. I create user-centered, intuitive, and visually engaging digital experiences using Figma and industry-standard tools. With practical experience in broadcasting design at SNRT, freelance work, and my journey at Netopia (first as a paid intern, then as a full-time designer), I strive to bridge functionality with aesthetics.

services.name: UX/UI Design
services.description: Crafting intuitive and user-centered digital interfaces that enhance user experience and engagement, using tools like Figma to create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs.

services.name: Product Design
services.description: Designing innovative and functional digital products by combining user research, prototyping, and iterative testing to ensure seamless functionality and aesthetic appeal.

services.name: Branding
services.description: Developing cohesive brand identities, including logos, typography, and visual guidelines, to create memorable and consistent brand experiences across all touchpoints.

education.institution: Institut Spécialisé de Technologie Appliquée NTIC, Rabat

education.degree: Baccalaureate in Life and Earth Sciences (SVT)

work_experience.description: Full-time UX/UI Designer focusing on user-centered digital products and interface design.
Worked as a paid intern, contributing to real client projects, developing skills in user experience and interface design.
Created graphic designs, brochures, business cards, and custom branding solutions for various clients.

work_experience.company: SNRT (Société Nationale de Radiodiffusion et de Télévision)
work_experience.description: Worked in the Infographics department of 'La Quatrième' Channel, producing visual content for TV broadcasts.
